extendedInfo.description: Users can add pins to their personal lists by hand or by searching through the website Pinpics. Pin information includes:issue sizelocation of release, year of issue,type of pin (traveling, open stock, etc.),picture of the pin, listing price. Application allows for easy access to an account of owned pins and pins sought by the pin trader, especially useful while away from your collection.PinMaster, a virtual list of your pin collection, helps pin traders avoid loosing track of their pins.keywords: Pin Trading, Android, Disney, Pinpics,

reviews.title: This makes my trading more fun
reviews.comment: Now I do not need to print out a sheet of pins I want when I go trading. I also have a list of the pins I have. Since I have so many its hard to remember them all.
reviews.author: Greg Boswell

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: This app does not work at all. It doesn\'t even show the results of the pin you are searching for. Please do not waste your time installing this app
reviews.author: Kyle Patrick
